sections.heading: Reasonable efforts to secure advantageous loan for borrower6-991
sections.text: 08.Reasonable efforts to secure advantageous loan for borrowerA loan originator shall make reasonable efforts to secure a loan that is reasonably advantageous to the borrower considering all of the circumstances, including the interest
